previous.excerpt:
Hey guys,

unfortunately I missed the promising tech stocks like $net $ttd $okta $crwd in
their early days and now the valuations seem a bit high for me regarding the
risk/return profile.

So I would like to ask if you are watching any promising tech stock right now?
Maybe one that is still a bitâ€¦

A group of friends and I have been investing for awhile and each of us has their
own 'area' they focus on. In general for you own portion of capital in a sector
you will defer to the opinion of the 'specialist' on where to invest it, and
they to you for whatever you specialize in. There are alsoâ€¦
